api_name: Datadog API Collection: Send invitation emails
functionality: Sends emails to one or more users inviting them to join the organization.

api_name: Datadog API Collection: Get a user invitation
functionality: Returns a single user invitation by its UUID.

api_name: Datadog API Collection: List all users
functionality:
Get the list of all users in the organization. This list includes
all users even if they are deactivated or unverified.

api_name: Datadog API Collection: Create a user
functionality: Create a user for your organization.

api_name: Datadog API Collection: Disable a user
functionality:
Disable a user. Can only be used with an application key belonging
to an administrator user.

api_name: Datadog API Collection: Get user details
functionality: Get a user in the organization specified by the user’s `user_id`.

api_name: Datadog API Collection: Update a user
functionality:
Edit a user. Can only be used with an application key belonging
to an administrator user.

api_name: Datadog API Collection: Get a user organization
functionality:
Get a user organization. Returns the user information and all organizations
joined by this user.

api_name: Datadog API Collection: Get a user permissions
functionality:
Get a user permission set. Returns a list of the user’s permissions
granted by the associated user's roles.

api_name: Datadog API Collection: Create a custom variable
functionality: Creates an endpoint with the name `<CUSTOM_VARIABLE_NAME>`.

api_name: Datadog API Collection: Delete a custom variable
functionality: Deletes the endpoint with the name `<CUSTOM_VARIABLE_NAME>`.

api_name: Datadog API Collection: Get a custom variable
functionality:
Shows the content of the custom variable with the name `<CUSTOM_VARIABLE_NAME>`.

If the custom variable is secret, the value does not

api_name: Datadog API Collection: Update a custom variable
functionality: Updates the endpoint with the name `<CUSTOM_VARIABLE_NAME>`.

api_name: Datadog API Collection: Create a webhooks integration
functionality: Creates an endpoint with the name `<WEBHOOK_NAME>`.

api_name: Datadog API Collection: Delete a webhook
functionality: Deletes the endpoint with the name `<WEBHOOK NAME>`.

api_name: Datadog API Collection: Get a webhook integration
functionality: Gets the content of the webhook with the name `<WEBHOOK_NAME>`.

api_name: Datadog API Collection: Update a webhook
functionality: Updates the endpoint with the name `<WEBHOOK_NAME>`.
